title: Popularity Baselines: The Simplest Recommender
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Popularity Baselines: The Simplest Recommender.

hook.text: The world's simplest recommendation: show everyone what's popular. It's surprisingly good.

buildup.text: Popularity-based recommenders rank items by views, purchases, or ratingsâ€”no personalization needed.

discovery.text: This baseline handles the cold start: new users get popular items until you learn their taste.

twist.text: Popularity baselines beat 50% of sophisticated models in offline evaluations. Seriously.

climax.text: Always benchmark against popularity. If your complex model can't beat it, simplify.

quiz.question: Why are popularity baselines important?
options: They provide a benchmark that complex models must beat
